Module com.example.rucafe
Package com.example.rucafe

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
com.example.rucafe.MainController
public class MainController extends Object
This class is the Main GUI that has the buttons that lead to all the other GUIs
Author:
Sumanth Rajkumar, Shantanu Jain
